description: The SNMP trap that is generated when the Port receives frame
with source address not included in this port's MAC security
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MSCR-MIB::unresolvedMAC MSCR-MIB::nbMacScrRunPort i 9999 MSCR-MIB::nbMacScrRunPortLockingMAC s EXAMPL

description: Number of port to be managed.
variables.name: MSCR-MIB::nbMacScrRunPort

description: Last MAC address which locked this Port (prohibited access).
In this case Agent will Disable this Port and will
To improve this situation, manager must: to add the
locking MAC Address for the MAC Addresses list alowed
for this Port in the MAC Security Data Base or
to prevent coming of the prohibited MAC Address on
this Port in the future and then to Enable this Port.
variables.name: MSCR-MIB::nbMacScrRunPortLockingMAC
